msgSnippet: Hi, ... I am curious why nobody responded to my mail where I suggested the same architecture? Did you overlook? Is my english so bad that nobody understood it?

Hi, 

> >We have a ClasspathWalker that generates events that some
> >ClasspathwalkerListener consumes and operates on.
> >
> >I suggest testing each of these behaviors in isolation.
> >
> >* The ClasspathWalker correctly walks the classpath.
> >* The ClasspathWalker correctly generates events as it walks 
> the classpath.
> >* The ClasspathWalkerListener correctly handles the various kinds of
> >ClasspathWalker events

I am curious why nobody responded to my mail where I suggested
the same architecture? Did you overlook? Is my english so bad that
nobody understood it?

Bernd
subject: RE: [junit] ClasspathWalker (even better)
